website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and durable alternative to some pricier kettlebells on the market.
pros: Garners praise for its vinyl coating, which holds up well to regular use and protects the floor from scratches and dings
cons: Occasionally, users found that the handle had uncomfortable ridges that could be sanded off

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Kettlebell's are not my forte but I've been trying to spice up my workouts since the gyms are closed. Really need to work on my rack position, but the KB itself is easy to grip and hold. The silicone is nice as i use this on concrete and protects both my KB and my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: shockingly terrible. I'll tackle the aesthetics first
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 25 lb version and it is...well, shockingly terrible. I'll tackle the aesthetics first. The vinyl coating has large cracks in multiple places. It goes up a good three inches more on one side of the handle, as well. The primary issue with the kettle bell is that the handle is rough, uncomfortable, and way too small to fit both hands.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Well made and good for workout
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Sunny Health & Fitness Vinyl Coated Kettleball for my spouse to use during her workout. While 5 lbs does not seem like much, the kettleball provides a decent workout. The important thing is squatting and arm swings to get max benefit. I was concerned after reading other reviews but the Sunny Health & Fitness Vinyl Coated Kettleball is well made. The handle is smooth and the vinyl coating is a nice. There is no un-even-ness, bulging, or metal sticking out.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Kettle bells are a great free weight but different from traditional weights.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these out f desperation because I wanted 5 lb weights and the market was stripped from everyone buying work out equipment for there at home work outs since COVID-19 eliminated going to the gym. They take getting used to and I wear my biking gloves for a better grip. These were very affordable, well made, and I like the bright pink color.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great Kettle Bell
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this kettlebell. I have small hands (female) and was worried about ordering a kettle bell sight unseen especially after looking at them in stores such as Dick's. The handle diameter is not too large for my hands. At the same time, the space between the bell and handle is large enough that my husband who has normal sized hands could use it as well. Handle also didn't have any rough edges so I'm able to use it without gloves. Looking forward to using it on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Adaires

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 5-lb kettle bells. Arrived fast and are easy to work out with for beginners. Also they’re small and pink and so cute, lol, totally worth it! I will buy heavier ones once I work up to that level. Happy with this product and would recommend. Good pricing compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ksenia Green

customer_reviews.title: I want to start introducing her to double KB movements and thought these would be a perfect starting point for her
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these 15 lb. KBs for my wife. I want to start introducing her to double KB movements and thought these would be a perfect starting point for her. I was pleasantly surprised with the price and have no complaints with the overall quality of the bells. I will be putting these things to good use. Thanks for a solid and reasonable priced product.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Great kettlebell.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived incredibly fast, which is surprising considering shipping speeds and product availability. The handle is smooth, the coating is in tact, and the wide handle allows both hands on it. For the price, this was an unbeatable deal. Will look to purchase more fitness equipment from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey M

customer_reviews.title: Nice kettle bell
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about with this weight. It does exactly what it should...which is to be heavy. The entire body of the weight is made of cast iron, and the lower section is coated in plastic dip. You could go out and buy one of the more expensive 'name brand' weights, but this one is the exact same thing for less money. I am sure this one will last many years to come. The handle portion is comfortable and has no rough spots or ridges. It seems like the manufacturer took some time to sand or polish the surface to make it more friendly to your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: I like the vinyl coating on the bell
customer_reviews.text: Great kettle bell. I have others with and without the vinyl coating. The coating saves my floors from issues. Coating probably not that important if bell is used in a gym, but for home I prefer a coating.
customer_reviews.author: TBL

customer_reviews.title: A
customer_reviews.text: My husband got it for my birthday and I love the color. Perfect size and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Somjai

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Kettle Bell
customer_reviews.text: This Kettle bell has been a great addition to my workout routine. That said, what can you say about a weight? The construction for the kettle bell is solid, and the vinyl coating has held up after many vigorous workouts. This kettle bell has lived up to all of my expectations, and will be buying from this brand again when I need to move up to higher weight.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Holm

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice - Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these kettlebells. Very reasonably priced at ten dollars each when I purchased and would buy again. Seems to be well made and very easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: NorthEasternBelle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 20lb bell for myself to use during KettleWorx workouts. Bell quality is good. The vinyl is in good condition and has great coverage of bell and partial handle (looks like the picture). Price is very competitive. Same size at retails stores was nearly double the price on Amazon. The handle is pretty big, so it might not be real safe for people with smaller hands since they might have a hard time getting a good grip. I have just used it in lifting moves, not swings yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine. Like everyone else stuck at home, I need equipment. I purchased the 25 lb kettlebell, and just used it. Am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nevanna

customer_reviews.title: I love these bells
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are excellent bells. They're balanced well and a great size for my small female hands. (I'm not sure how they'd be for men, you'd have to ask one.) The company also assured me that they don't have lead in the coating which is all too common with kettlebells. I like to colors for easily differentiating weights. Overall I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Adams

customer_reviews.title: 👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed, shipping took forever but I guess everyone’s working out from home due to the pandemic
customer_reviews.author: GRAY

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality kettle bell.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality kettle bell. I have purchased the 5, 10, and 15. I started with the 5 to get the movements down. I highly recommend starting light to gain good form, since using kettle bells is very different than standard weight lifting. I plan to lend out the lighter ones to friends who want to get started, and use them when I get pregnant. The prices are so good it easy to build a collection. I plan to get heavier ones for myself and my husband. I highly recommend these bells.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stark

customer_reviews.title: Its made for us tiny people
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, fits smaller hands well. Looking at it you don't expect it to weigh much but it def does!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Gann

customer_reviews.title: Cast iron is compact compared to sand-filled weights
customer_reviews.text: This 5-lb weight is tiny, which is great because I don't want to fight a bulky weight when I'm maneuvering thru my workouts. The rubber coating helps protect your floor and any body parts you might hit. Very well put together. Much preferred over the funky plastic weights filled with sand. This weight is very hard to find in the stores in cast iron. They usually have 7 or 10-lb. which is too heavy to me on the shoulders and neck as a starting weight .
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed to start adding some weight training to my aerobic workouts. The price was much lower than similar products I saw elsewhere and after just about a month of daily use, I'm seeing and feeling results. The only negative is that after using the kettle bell, my hands smell of the cast iron handle and I have to use serious soap to get rid of the smell (hand wipes or mild soap won't do the trick). if the plastic coating on the bottom of the bell could be extended to cover the handle, I'd definitely rate it a 5 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: 20 lb Kettle Bell
customer_reviews.text: Small but heavy :) I like the handle for all types of swings. The side is flat, not round, and it lands nicely on my forearm while doing the overhead swings...I do wear padding on my forearms or 20 pounds would bruise me badly no matter how smooth the swing. It has a nice color of blue too...I know that's not what you're looking for in a kettle bell but it's a good little bonus.
customer_reviews.author: thsp

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!! Excellent addtion to my exercise Program
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this product. I chose this product for my daughter who wants to exercise at home., Got her several Kettle Bells for Christmas. She was very happy and pleased. I like the vinyl covering to cushion against your floors. The handles are wide grip, so you can comfortably place two hands on handle or one. It is a perfection addition to any weight collection. I would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around locally for a kettle bell, but found the prices to be much better on Amazon. I am very pleased with this purchase. It is of great quality and I even got free two-day shipping because of my Prime membership. You can't beat that! I am planning to order another one of a heavier weight to use with my workouts. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Great feel on grip. Rubber-ed body. Great for 3-5 times a week, 10-15 minutes a day exercises. Just make sure to get the right weight for your body strength. I have 10LB for my mom and 25 LB for me and my dad.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great kettlebell for beginners. Very satisfied with the quality and true description of this product and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R. McNeill

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this kettle bell
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this kettle bell for about 2 months and am very pleased with it. The handle is not vinyl coated but has a bit of texture on it which makes it easier to grip as your hand sweats. I had read some warnings that the vinyl might crack but so far I have had no problems. The vinyl coating is quite thick. My wife has a 5 lb. one of the same manufacturer and has the same experience.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Sage

customer_reviews.title: Super Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am a very picky woman! But, my Kettle Bell arrived on time and very well packaged to prevent damage. The item describe on Amazon is what I received. The Kettle Bell is EXACTLY as described in the picture. I ordered 15lb Kettle Bell and there is nothing wrong with it. No, cracks or peeling. This was certainly a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Tee

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a 15 lb. kettlebell to add to my collection. I don't care that none of my bells match style-wise (all different brands), as long as they are functional and easy to use. I have small hands so no problem with the handle size. Looks to be decently made. Overall, a good value. I saw a 15 lb. kettlebell at Target for $40.
customer_reviews.author: Stormee

customer_reviews.title: Great price for an excellent kettle bell
customer_reviews.text: Great price for an excellent kettle bell. As others mentioned there can and probably will be shards on the handle, but these can be flicked off with a fingernail or sanded down in seconds and not a reason for me to take a star off. I love the vinyl cover and my only complaint is I wish they sold them in heavier weights. I have use kettle bells for years and never seen this quality at such a low price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed there was no rubber grip on the handle part of the Bell which made the Bell feel awkward and not smooth in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: doris210

customer_reviews.title: Mhm
customer_reviews.text: Didnt know what to expect since these are sold nm out everywhere but its actually pretty nice quality. The texture for the grip helps when you start sweating it up. :p
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good but small
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Smaller than expected so its a little awkward to hold but it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Mayte D. Perello

customer_reviews.title: perfect.. I'd had a frozen shoulder for a ...
customer_reviews.text: perfect.. I'd had a frozen shoulder for a year or so and I've been gradually doing weight exercises, I started from 1 lb, then 2 lbs and so on.. now I'm proud to lift and swing this 10 pounder with ease. It looks very nice, the coating is soft, the price is great, what's not to like..
customer_reviews.author: Cali Mama

customer_reviews.title: great kettlebell
customer_reviews.text: great kettlebell. i had no issues that other reviewers mentioned in regards to metal splinters or it being lopsided. mine is very well made and pretty much the same as my go fit kettlebell. i ordered the red 15lb one and i love it. and the price is really good, way better than dick's or play it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good kettle bell
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews that weren't very favorable, but the kettle bell I received is very nice. Has a good flat bottom, and the vinyl coating is nicely done. I would order this brand again when I need a heavier kettle bell.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: but I like the vinyl coating
customer_reviews.text: I know I'm a wuss, but I like the vinyl coating. Great quality and better price than anything I could find locally. Nice finish on the metal. Once I go from toothpick arms to pencils, I'm gonna grab the 30 from this same manufacturer. Don't forget the first rule of cross-fit...
customer_reviews.author: William E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: It was a lot smaller than I expected. That’s a big part for the 1 star. Like I know it’s 5lbs but that must’ve been made for my toddler son.
customer_reviews.author: Marquia Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Made well.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing negative about this 5 lb kettle ball I can say. Perfect size. Perfect weight. Easy to use. Pretty too :)
customer_reviews.author: Anna W.

customer_reviews.title: Narrow handle makes this a bit hard to hold
customer_reviews.text: I like the rubber coating on the base of this kettlebell, but the handle is not really wide enough for a 2-handed grip. I have to let my pinkie fingers hang awkwardly outside of the handle because both of my hands don't fit in the handle at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Monkeygirl13

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and ordered heavier this was just to light for me
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Lee

customer_reviews.title: I find this kettle bell to be of good quality. I have 2 of the 25 pounders
customer_reviews.text: I find this kettle bell to be of good quality. I have 2 of the 25 pounders. The vinyl coating is evenly applied. The handle is smooth and has no imperfections. I would recommend this, if you're looking for a quality bell with a nice price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great kettlebell!
customer_reviews.text: Great kettlebell!! I love the vinyl coating, it makes it a little easier to grip once your hands get sweaty, I personally don't wear gloves, I get hot enough doing my routine, I don't want to add more coverage and heat so the vinyl helps my sweaty hands to grip better! Definitely recommend this kettlebell!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kettlebell
customer_reviews.text: The handle is smaller than I anticipated and tends to be slightly slippery, but aside from that I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 5lb bell to start working out with. It does what it's suppose to do, it's a weight. My only complaint is that the handle isn't wide enough to comfortably hold with both hands. I assume with the heavier bells the handle is wider.
customer_reviews.author: Leeci

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture. The handle has a nice grip. Its 15 pounds in a compact weight. I recommend this kettle bell
customer_reviews.author: gizcoope

customer_reviews.title: Love this Kettlebell
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold, change movements. Great weight to begin using.
customer_reviews.author: ladydi

customer_reviews.title: Great Equipment
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this kettle bell after checking them out at a local equipment retail store. This sunny vinyl coated kettle bell is amazing! The vinyl coating keeps it from damaging my wood floors too!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs jones

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great 15lb kettlebell. I like the rubber coating and that it provides some protection against a hard surface. The handle is smooth and moves easily in my hand. Great deal - a similar kettlebell was twice the price in my local store. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great bell for a great price. I love the vinyl coating so the bell doesn't chip (or destroy my home) should I drop it. It matches my go fit brand kettle bells.I REALLY didn't want the orange one they sell! I also purchased the 5lb and 10lb bells completing my set.
customer_reviews.author: Dezgirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me. Just the right weight and very good quality. And it is red, my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kettlebell. If your looking for a complete body workout look no further than a kettlebell.
customer_reviews.author: J. Will

customer_reviews.title: This kettle bell is very well made, true to ...
customer_reviews.text: This kettle bell is very well made, true to advertised poundage and the vinyl covering softens set-down very well. The handle is not vinyl coated, making for a safer grip. I only bought one but will fill out my set soon.
customer_reviews.author: crispybuffalo

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but decent
customer_reviews.text: this is a decent product for the money spent, but it did have some sharp barbs on the handle and doesn't sit flat on the ground because the iron under the vinyl is lumpy, for lack of a better word. I'd buy it again, but be aware it's not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: polytones

customer_reviews.title: Love that this Kettle Bell has vinyl on it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest kettle Bell I have seen. I love that it has the vinyl on it. It is the perfect weight for me. I plan on getting heavier ones once I feel comfortable with the 10 pound kettle bell.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight/size/color for my ten year old gymnast.
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice feel to it. It is hard to find kettlebells that are only five pounds. This one fit the bill for my daughter's training needs.
customer_reviews.author: jon a dodd

customer_reviews.title: In good condition. Great price rate for what your paying ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in the mail , In good condition. Great price rate for what your paying for , great for working out at home 100% would recommend
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold and the covering keeps it from banging my floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Kettlebell seems to be well made. There are no seams on the handle. The vinyl is easy to grip when you're holding the body of the kettlebell. And with prime the shipping was free which is nice because with kettlebells being heavy, shipping is usually expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M.

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job. Solid Construction.
customer_reviews.text: This kettle bell is perfect for building initial strength. The weight seems low, but you dont need as heavy a weight with the amount of burn you can get from a kettle bell. Definitely a permenant fixer in my morning routine.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Arykson

customer_reviews.title: vinyl kettlebells
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly what I wanted. It is very well made and the handle is smooth and does not irritate my hands. Delivery service was also excellent. I would recommend this product and this company. I also bought a 15-lb from sunny with same excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect I practice at a class with KB. But wanted my own. There are so many handle styles out there. I am a woman with small wrists and hands, and these are perfect. I have some other with a larger style handle and must sell the, as the grip is awkward. Love the color and vinyl coating too. I am going to order some heavier ones now.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: While I'd much prefer lying on the sofa, this kettle bell does it's job well at making me stronger.
customer_reviews.author: flhellee

customer_reviews.title: HIGH QUALITY-AMAZING PRICE
customer_reviews.text: A bit too heavy for me. So I'm using a hand weight to increase up to this 5-pound bell. I also bought the Ultimate Kettle Bell Workout for Beginners CD. An excellent pairing.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend as you can also use to work the whole ...
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend as you can also use to work the whole core, legs, inner/outter thighs by placing your feet through if you don't have a thigh/leg press machine at home as well as strengthening your arms and back.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: It's a good starting weight for me
customer_reviews.text: I've been working out with this for a while. It's a good starting weight for me. The handle is comfortable to lift and it has held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have held up well with much use
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my husband. great quality and he enjoys them.
customer_reviews.author: V. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: New to kettle ball workout
customer_reviews.text: Product just as described. Did my first beginner kettle bell workout this morning. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Culbertson

customer_reviews.title: A little cramped..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my at home workouts, just wish the top was a bit wider so I could fit both hands comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: J. Watson

customer_reviews.title: I love the quality and price of this bell
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality and price of this bell! I found one almost identical at Target for almost three times the price! Thank you for making quality products at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bush

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Correct weight. Good coating. I use it lightly at home for arm workouts. Works better than a regular weight because I can grip it to move it around. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Good for moms on the go
customer_reviews.text: Great weight. Love the Vinyl Coating as I have hard wood floors and didn't want them to get scratched. The handle is fairly comfortable for a kettle bell. It is a good value. I use them nearly daily and haven't had any issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: SJRivero

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, exactly what I needed ! Not too light or too heavy, easy to handle, non sticky handle is very much appreciated, especially after an hour of training, it works great ! Thanks !
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: I love my kettlebells (KBs) and use them everyday
customer_reviews.text: I love my kettlebells (KBs) and use them everyday! You can get a FULL BODY workout with just ONE piece of equipment! Just an FYI... If you have smaller hands or your hands sweat, you might want to buy some workout gloves to help you grip the KB better. I have not found any KBs that have "small" handles. Overall, I love these and recommend then to EVERYONE!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Love this kettle bell
customer_reviews.text: I use this for working out especially for squats and it's so tiny but heavy. I love the coated kettle bell. It's great to use i plan on getting more sizes as needed. The handle is smooth and the rubberis grippy.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: a good bargain at the price I got them
customer_reviews.text: a slight edge on the grab bar leaves me only liking this product a lot, otherwise, a good bargain at the price I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Nice for new clients
customer_reviews.text: Nice for new clients, especially my seniors. With kettle bell swings, squats, and such; it's the perfect resistance to get them started. Quality is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Regnier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife really like the versatility of this and uses 3-4 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas

customer_reviews.title: I love my kettle ball
customer_reviews.text: I love my kettle ball! So glad I chose to get one. No problems with this one getting loose while I sweat or anything like that. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Great Kettle Bell
customer_reviews.text: Great Kettle Bell! Easy to handle, and the vinyl coating helps it from preventing scratches or scuffs on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice and very easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice and very easy to hold. I have very small hands and sometimes the handles are too large but these are great.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a chunk of iron dipped in vinyl. The handle is smooth and well-sized.
customer_reviews.author: Waco

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Got this for the house and I didn't care it was yellow! Great for working out at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jess L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really heavy compared to a 20 pounder. It kicks my butt!
customer_reviews.author: Mac/Cheese

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kettle bell for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kettle bell for the price. Seems to be well made and fits well in the hand. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a small kettle bell.
customer_reviews.author: Ghoulscout

customer_reviews.title: it works awesome. great quality
customer_reviews.text: priced checked everywhere locally, bought this product from here and have been using it for cross fit, it works awesome. great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Systems

customer_reviews.title: Good bells!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 bells and they have been such a great part of my daily workouts. Helping to build up some strength and get in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: They work good.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my daily workouts. No complaints. They work good.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Powerstein

customer_reviews.title: Great bell if you do not want to spend $$$ for a GoFit contoured bell
customer_reviews.text: For beginning kettle bell users, this is a great product. For those that are more advanced but still can't use the heavier kettle weights - this is also great for you. I have been using kettle bells for some time now. I use the 18 lb for swings, cleans, clean/press and squats. For the high pull and snatch - I was using a 12 lb, which was not heavy enough. So, I recently purchased this 15 lb and love it. I like the GoFit contoured bells, but the 15 lb GoFit is $20+ more. This one does the job. I do love the GoFit contoured bell, but again - this will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: TeresaC

customer_reviews.title: Great kettlebell
customer_reviews.text: It's very straightforward and easy to grip. The vinyl coating helps keep it from rolling around wherever I place it. I would buy other weights from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rosy W.

customer_reviews.title: Great kettle bell for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great kettle bell for the price. The plastic covering over the bottom half of the kettle bell is sturdy and shows no signs of wear after 4 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: DAVE C

customer_reviews.title: A MUST have!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a GREAT buy. I use them daily. I was really happy they were reasonably priced. I would recommend them and I will buy again if mine ever wears out.
customer_reviews.author: MS17

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and cheaper than what I could find locally.
customer_reviews.text: It's strudy and solid It's got a great handle design. It's vinyl coated and 25 pounds. Cheap and delivered to your door. What else can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: The David

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very small.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 pound kettle bell from the same brand and really love it as it works well with both hands. This one has a handle that is about the right size for one hand. I would've given it five stars if the company had figured out someway to make the handle broad enough for two hands. I prefer to do Kettlebail activities with both hands as it keeps the stress balanced on my muscles. You can't beat the quality of these kettle bells. They hold up and with the coating over the iron they keep the possibility of any rust from the iron transferring to your floors where you where likely to store them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen in Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Good weight.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice weight, holds easily in hand and I can actually hold it with two. I got the ten pounder. Hurt my back doing the "Swing" but that's my own fault.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it and it arrived as promised. Wish it had an exercise guide included as I'm a novice.
customer_reviews.author: breezenby

customer_reviews.title: Great price and feel
customer_reviews.text: Great price and feel! Was looking for the coated kettle bell and this is so much cheaper than in store!
customer_reviews.author: S. Tros

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for age 68!
customer_reviews.text: How can you go wrong? It works perfect. Advise is to watch a few YouTube videos on the correct way to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lindow

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how you could mess up a kettlebell. 5 stars. Just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Weldon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: A great little kettle bell! I'm not a fitness expert as many others on here purport to be, but this kettle bell suits my needs. I have small hands and don't have any therefore don't have problems with the size of the handle. Plus, I love the color!
customer_reviews.author: NPSLC1

product_meta.title: Sunny Health & Fitness Vinyl Coated Kettlebell
product_meta.description: Develop power, endurance and balance with Sunny Health & Fitness No. 066 Vinyl Coated Kettlebell Weights. Increase the intensity of your workout with these high quality kettlebells that will sculpt and tone the entire body. Lifting and controlling forces the muscle targeting in the core, arms, and back while building strength and stability. Made out of high grad cast-iron material, it is great for training indoors and outdoors. Whether you workout at home or at your home gym, take them wherever you go. The Sunny Health Fitness Vinyl covered Kettlebell Weights is the ideal choice for those seeking a special edge in strength and power.
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY VINYL COAT FINISH: Durable cast iron encased with color-coded vinyl prevents corrosion, increases durability and protects flooring. Featured in multiple weights varying from 5 to 25 lbs.
WIDE HANDLES: Smooth, high-quality textured handle provides a comfortable & secure grip for high reps and slow controlled movements. You can also do a multitude of ballistic and grind exercises.
FLAT BOTTOM: Flat base allows upright storage. It also makes it easier to hold in push-up postion, renegade rows, mounted pistol squats & other exercises requiring a kettlebell with a flat bottom.

FOR ALL FITNESS ENTHUSIASTS: Kettlebells can be used by crossfitters, strength trainers, sports performance, HIIT workouts etc. Build up your cardio and muscular endurance with the all-in-one fitness equipment. Used for swings, deadlifts, squats.
ERGONOMIC: Compact kettlebell size allows you to take your weights to the park, gym or on the go. Use these cannonball-shaped workout tools to get a leaner and tighter figure.
